com.vectorprint.configuration.binding.parameters

Class EscapingBindingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.configuration.binding.AbstractBindingHelperDecorator<ParamBindingHelper>
      • com.vectorprint.configuration.binding.parameters.AbstractParamBindingHelperDecorator
        • com.vectorprint.configuration.binding.parameters.EscapingBindingHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindingHelper, ParamBindingHelper

    public final class EscapingBindingHelper
extends AbstractParamBindingHelperDecorator
    implementation for the syntax supported by PropertiesParser, escapes ',', '|' and ')', , uses '|' as separator for array values Threadsafe: it is safe to call the available methods from different threads at the same time on one instance of this class.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
    See Also:
    StringConverter
